entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHEAST IN THE AFTERNOON

CLOUDY
FREEZING RAIN, SLEET AND SNOW SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 30
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 70 PERCENT

FREEZING RAIN
RAIN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 30
EAST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SNOW SHOWERS, FREEZING RAIN AND RAIN SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S
LOWS 10 TO 15

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS ZERO TO 5 ABOVE ZERO
HIGHS AROUND 20
